name: Monster Turned!
description:
You're a monster that was raised by evil ones, but seeing those poor prisoners made your heart softer. Free the prisoners!

Arrow keys/WASD  - move

F - attack enemies

I - free cage

Mouse - look around

Credits:

Programmer - Jake Bayer, Maria Shurupova

2D Artist - Maria Shurupova

3D Artist - Matthew Beirm
